column3:
option to determine input value for AOD
at 550 nm;

=1 : input constant value from namelist
option "aer_aod550_val"

=2 : input value from auxiliary input 15; 
which is a time-varying 2d grid in NetCDF 
wrf-compatible format

option to determine input value for
Angstrom exponent;

=1 : input constant value from namelist
option "aer_angexp_val"

=2 : input value from auxiliary input 5; 
which is a time-varying 2d grid in NetCDF 
wrf-compatible format

=3 : value estimated from the aerosol
type defined in "aer_type," and modulated 
with the RH in WRF

option to determine input value for
single scattering albedo;

=1 : input constant value from namelist
option "aer_ssa_val"

=2 : input value from auxiliary input 5; 
which is a time-varying 2d grid in NetCDF 
wrf-compatible format

=3 : value estimated from the aerosol
type defined in "aer_type," and modulated 
with the RH in WRF

option to determine input value for
asymmetry parameter;

=1 : input constant value from namelist
option "aer_asy_val"

=2 : input value from auxiliary input 5; 
which is a time-varying 2d grid in NetCDF 
wrf-compatible format

=3 : value estimated from the aerosol
type defined in "aer_type," and modulated 
with the RH in WRF

aerosol type used with the above "aer*" 
options;

=1 : rural

=2 : urban

=3 : maritime
